product_name: REI Telus Rain Pants - Men's - 30" Inseam
long_description: Highly breathable, waterproof and windproof, the men's 30 in. inseam REI Telus eVent(R) Rain Pants offer the ultimate in protection, performance and comfort for your backcountry adventures. Pants are windproof to 60 mph and are ideal for aerobic activities in cold, windy, wet weather, such as alpine touring, climbing, snowshoeing and spring skiing. eVent fabric has a unique membrane that allows sweat vapor to easily pass through the fabric; so you can go all out, yet stay drier and enjoy chill-free rest stops. Strategically placed 2-way-stretch panels enhance movement and performance. Internal back elastic belt with rip-and-stick side tabs allows you to easily personalize the fit. Brushed tricot-lined waistband wicks away moisture; includes zip fly and snap closure. Gusseted stretch crotch and articulated knees maximize mobility. Lower leg zippers are designed with 3 in. wide gussets to fit over a variety of boot widths. Welded hand pockets have water-resistant zippers; pants also feature a back zip pocket. REI Telus rain pants have an active fit that allows a full range of motion.
short_description: Highly breathable, waterproof and windproof, the men's 30 in. inseam REI Telus eVent(R) Rain Pants offer the ultimate in protection, performance and comfort for your backcountry adventures.
